content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a fair price. Would you consider starting lower than the market rate?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm not known for being fair, Maryam. I want to get the highest price possible. I suggest we start at 2000 Euros. I'm not interested in being reasonable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure we can find a price that is fair for both of us. How about 1500 Euros? It's a good starting point for negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 1500 Euros is too low, Maryam. I want to get the most out of this deal. I'll meet you at 1700 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, 1700 Euros is still quite high for the area. I'm sure you can do better. How about 1400 Euros? It's a fair offer considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 1400 Euros is too low, Maryam. I want to get the most out of this deal. I'll meet you at 1600 Euros, but I won't go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. 1600 Euros is still quite high for the area, but I'm willing to compromise. Since the apartment is unfurnished, how about 1450 Euros? It's a fair price for both parties.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 1450 Euros is too low, Maryam. I want to get the most out of this deal. I'll meet you at 1550 Euros, but I won't go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is admirable. 1550 Euros is a significant improvement, but I'm still looking to pay less. How about 1475 Euros? It's a fair price, and I'm sure you'll find it reasonable.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 1475 Euros is too low, Maryam. I want to get the most out of this deal. I'll meet you at 1525 Euros, but I won't go any lower.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
